TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 將 HTTP 要求 欄位的值繫結至參數物件。

span.span: Binds the value of an HTTP request field to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別中的表單變數的值繫結来用於參數化的查詢或命令的參數集合。You can use the class to bind the value of a form variable in the collection to a parameter used in a parameterized query or command. 將資料繫結至參數的控制項可能會擲回例外狀況，如果指定但沒有對應的表單變數會傳遞。Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a is specified but no corresponding form variable is passed. 如果您的表單變數傳遞沒有對應的值，它們也可能會顯示任何資料。They might also display no data if the form variable is passed with no corresponding value. 設定若要避免這些情況下，在適當的地方。Set the to avoid these situations where appropriate. 類別會提供屬性，可識別要繫結，除了繼承的表單變數名稱類別。The class provides the property, which identifies the name of the form variable to bind to, in addition to those inherited from the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不會驗證表單項目以任何方式; 所傳遞的值便會使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大部分情況下，您可以驗證的值它正由資料來源控制項所處理的事件，例如之前`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`您使用的資料來源控制項所公開的事件。In most cases you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果參數的值未通過驗證測試，您可以藉由設定取消資料作業相關聯的屬性類別`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項和簡單的 ASP.NET Web 網頁。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple ASP.NET Web page. 目前的資料，資料表中的資料會顯示在控制項。The current data in the data table is displayed in the control. 您可以藉由輸入值中的新增記錄控制項，然後按一下按鈕。You can add new records by entering values in the controls and clicking the button. 按一下按鈕時，將指定的值插入資料庫，而會重新整理。When the button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件以建立建構函式會以其所有屬性的預設值初始化。A object created with the constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties. 初始化為。The is initialized to . 此外，屬性會初始化為，則屬性會初始化為，則屬性會初始化為，和屬性會初始化為 null (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)。Additionally, the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , and the property is initialized to null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 不會驗證表單項目以任何方式; 所傳遞的值便會使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大部分情況下，您可以驗證的值它正由資料來源控制項所處理的事件，例如之前`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`您使用的資料來源控制項所公開的事件。In most cases, you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果參數的值未通過驗證測試，您可以藉由設定取消資料作業相關聯的屬性類別`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. A that is associated with the page where the is used.

summary.span: 更新並傳回 物件的值。

span.span: An object that represents the updated and current value of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嘗試繫結到表單變數每次呼叫方法。The attempts to bind to the form variable every time the method is called. `context`參數由方法來擷取要求的指定的表單欄位的值。The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the value of the specified form field from the request. `control`參數會被忽略。The `control` parameter is ignored.

Public Property FormField As String
public: property System::String ^ FormField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FormField : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定參數所繫結的表單變數名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the form variable that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 識別參數所繫結之表單變數的字串。

span.span: A string that identifies the form variable to which the parameter binds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別傳入的名稱/值組集合。The identifies a name/value pair that is passed in the collection. 雖然屬性會識別組，名稱在執行階段繫結至其對應的值。While the property identifies the name of the pair, the binds to its corresponding value at run time. 如果預期的表單變數的字串名稱/值組不會傳遞給集合中的 ASP.NET 網頁方法來繫結參數的值屬性，如果已設定。If the expected form variable string name/value pair is not passed to the ASP.NET Web page in the collection, the method binds the parameter to the value of the property, if it is set. 如果未設定，方法時，無法將參數繫結的值。If the is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以顯示 已篩選的資料，使用控制項和來擷取的中介層商務物件中的資料和控制項來顯示結果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control and a to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 在程式碼範例所組成，則控制項，控制項，並送出 按鈕。The code example consists of a , a control, the control, and a submit button. 根據預設，會填入其中一個 Northwind Traders 員工的名稱。By default, the is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees. 會顯示在名稱所識別之員工的資訊。The displays information about the employee identified by the name in the . 若要擷取另一位員工的資料，請輸入中的員工的完整名稱，然後按一下按鈕。To retrieve data on another employee, enter the full name of the employee in the and click the button. 屬性會指定用來篩選所擷取的資料運算式。The property specifies an expression used to filter the data retrieved by the . 這個屬性會使用參數預留位置中所包含的參數評估集合。This property uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters contained in the collection. 在此範例中，是參數預留位置的值繫結控制項。In this example, the parameter placeholder is a bound to the value of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示先前的程式碼範例所使用的中介層商務物件。The following code example shows the middle-tier business object that the previous code example uses. 這個範例包含兩個基本類別︰`EmployeeLogic`類別會封裝商務邏輯和`NorthwindEmployee`類別是包含只載入和保存資料層中的資料所需的基本功能的模型類別。This example consists of two basic classes: The `EmployeeLogic` class encapsulates business logic, and the `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class that contains only the basic functionality required to load and persist data from the data tier. 為了簡單起見，`EmployeeLogic`類別會建立一組靜態的資料，而不是從資料層擷取資料。For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier. 它也很有用的此範例中，因為此範例依賴使用者提供示範篩選是 Northwind Traders 員工的完整名稱。It is also helpful for this example, because the sample relies on the user to provide the full name of a Northwind Traders employee to demonstrate filtering. 如需完整的實用範例，您必須編譯，並使用這些類別提供的 ASP.NET 程式碼範例。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the ASP.NET code examples provided. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不會驗證表單項目以任何方式; 所傳遞的值便會使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大部分情況下，您可以驗證的值它正由資料來源控制項所處理的事件，例如之前`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`您使用的資料來源控制項所公開的事件。In most cases, you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果參數的值未通過驗證測試，您可以藉由設定取消資料作業相關聯的屬性類別`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/northwindemployee9.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/northwindemployee9.vb#2)]

span.span: if client input is validated; otherwise, .
